subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ Carlos Torres, who was making his first start for the Mets and his first in the majors since 2010, cruised until the fifth inning, but Andrew McCutchen led a Pirates rally.
snippet: The Mets’ Carlos Torres, who was making his first start for the Mets and his first in the majors since 2010, cruised until the fifth inning, but Andrew McCutchen led a Pirates rally.
